text_block_list.text: It's been several weeks since I've become Fine Motion's trainer. She's training hard with her friends and having fun today too.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend
text_block_list.text: -See ya later, Fine! Good work today with training!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Good work! Let's work hard tomorrow, too!
choice_data_list: You worked hard today too, didn't you?
You worked hard today too, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufu. It's been so fun I barely noticed that I was getting tired. Somehow, everyday has felt like a dream come true.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …well then. It's unfortunate, but shall we call it a day? We should head back to the trainers' office and have a meeting!
But… this day that I thought would end just like normal. At the very end, a little incident was waiting for us.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Huh? What's this?!
When we returned to the trainers' office we discovered, the shelf in the corner had collapsed and everything on it had been scattered all over the place.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: … Hm, hm. A locked room with nobody in it. But in spite of that, there's a collapsed shelf and messy floor-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Aaah! -Awesome! Trainer, is this by any chance, a "mystery"?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, in that case, this incident… Looks like a job for Great Detective Fine!
choice_data_list: When did you become a Great Detective…?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahem, ahem. Well then, first let's do an on-site inspection. After all, "observation" was important for outstanding detectives of the past.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh! Look here, Assistant-kun! Right here there are some footprints! Perhaps these are the culprit's!?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, my noodle-colored brain cells have made it clear! Definitely, if we follow these, we'll find our answer-

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: …nya?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …nya?
When we followed the footprints… There, under a desk, staring at us with vigilant eyes was a single cat.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I see… with this, all the questions have been answered!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: The culprit is… you!
choice_data_list: That seems to be the case…
That seems to be the case…

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: HISS!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It's okay, no need to be scared. Come here.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh? You've got a collar on, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Looks that way. Maybe it got lost and found its way in here?

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: Nyau…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Good kitty. It's okay. Let's get you home, okay?
choice_data_list: I guess we're looking for its owner now
I guess we're looking for its owner now

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yep! With that, this case will be closed! Let's go and gather information!
And so, first we asked the nearby students. Further, we even used Fine Motion's Ramen Info Network to search-

text_block_list.name: Owner
text_block_list.text: I can't thank you enough! I thought I wouldn't ever be able to see her again…!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I'm glad I could be of help. Well then, good day to the both of you.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Well then! Case Closed! Assistant-kun, previously Trainer, good work!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Fufuu, that was fun. That was a wonderful surprise, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Right? Yep, yep, amid a normal day suddenly something happens …a special incident, huh?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Fufuu, we may have come across something wonderful.
